statements: DELETE FROM Energy_Storage WHERE device_id = 101 AND installation_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM Energy_Storage WHERE device_id = 100 AND installation_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM Energy_Storage WHERE regulatory_standard = 'UL-certified' AND storage_capacity > 1000;
DELETE FROM regulatory_standards WHERE year_issued = 2019 AND standard_name = 'Environmental Guidelines';
DELETE FROM energy_storage_sites WHERE location = 'California' AND capacity > 1000;
DELETE FROM compliance_reports WHERE agency_id = 2 AND compliance_status = false;
DELETE FROM EnergyUsageLogs WHERE log_id = 100 AND consumption > 1000;
